org.activebpel.timer
Class AeTimerManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.timer.AeTimerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStoppableTimerManager, commonj.timers.TimerManager
public class AeTimerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements commonj.timers.TimerManager, IAeStoppableTimerManager

Implementation of the TimerManager for Application Servers spec from CommonJ. Provides a facility for scheduling timer operations. Reference: http://dev2dev.bea.com/technologies/commonj/twm/index.jsp

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class AeTimerManager.AeTimerListener
          Inner class used to place a wrapper around TimerListeners so that we may defer their execution in the event that the timer manager is suspended.

deferTimerExecution

protected void deferTimerExecution(commonj.timers.Timer aTimer)
Used to defer execution of a timer when timer manager has been suspended. The timer will execute when the timer manager is resumed.

Parameters:
aTimer - The timer which is to be deferred

timerExecutionStart

protected void timerExecutionStart(commonj.timers.Timer aTimer)
Marks the given timer as currently executing.

Parameters:
aTimer - The timer which started execution

timerExecutionStop

protected void timerExecutionStop(commonj.timers.Timer aTimer)
Marks the given timer as having completed executiion.

Parameters:
aTimer - The timer to be removed.

getExecutingTimerCount

protected int getExecutingTimerCount()
Returns the number of timers which are currently executing.

waitForExecutingTimers

protected boolean waitForExecutingTimers(long aTimeout_ms)
                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Waits for the given amount of time for all currently executing timers to complete.

Parameters:
aTimeout_ms - The maximum amount of time to wait for
Returns:
True if all timers have completed, False otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

getPendingTimers

protected java.util.ArrayList getPendingTimers()
Returns the list of timers waiting to execute.

Returns the timer service which we delegate timer calls through.

Returns the current state of the timer manager.

aState - The timerManagerState to set.
